name: CygnettHome
0:
”Alexa, turn on switch”
”Alexa, set my light to 50%”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Cygnett Home allows you to control all your Cygnett Smart Home products via voice command. From changing your smart lighting colour and brightness to turning on and off appliances with a smart plug.
 
You can activate scenes that you have setup on the Cygnett Smart app via voice. Please ensure you have given your devices unique names so that it can be separately addressed when using voice commands.
